title: nadagit/lbfs linux port not utilizing GPU
body:
Been trying for days to try and get lbfs/DeepFaceLab_Linux to work. Mainly encountered user error programs but now when running ./4_data_src_extract_faces_S3FD.sh it only utilizes the CPU and my GPU (Tesla M40 24GB) sits at idle when opening nvidia-smi. Can someone tell me what I am doing wrong.


anaconda3 (deepfacelab) meta: 
nvidia-driver-455
python=3.6.8 
cudnn=7.6.5 
cudatoolkit=10.0.130

requirements-cuda.txt
-------------------------
tqdm
numpy==1.19.3
h5py
opencv-python==4.1.0.25
ffmpeg-python==0.1.17
scikit-image==0.14.2
colorama==0.4.4
tesnorflow-gpu==2.4.0rc1
pyqt5==5.15.2

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ based on requirements-cuda.txt in https://libraries.io/github/iperov/DeepFaceLab

I have tried nagadit/DeepFaceLab_Linux as well with python==3.7 & cudatoolkit==10.1.243 but to no avail.

update 12/7/20 - installed nvidia-cuda-toolkit, no change in utilization.
